Project.Brief history of your project and organi: China's intangible cultural heritage refers to various traditional cultural expressions passed down from generation to generation by the people of all ethnic groups in China, which are regarded as part of their cultural heritage, as well as physical objects and places related to traditional cultural expressions. Intangible cultural heritage is an important component of China's excellent traditional culture, a vivid witness to the continuous inheritance of Chinese civilization, and an important foundation for connecting national emotions and maintaining national unity.
